title: Getty Images
description: Build applications using the world's most powerful imagery

assets_added.description: Lists the assets that were added to the board.

assets_not_added.description: Lists the assets that were not added to the board.

asset_id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the asset.

download_notes.description: Associate a note with the download of an image.

project_code.description: Specifies the associated project code saved with the downloaded of an image.

id.description: Specifies the editorial source id of the image

name.description: Specifies the editorial source name of the image

AssetFamily.description: Specifies the asset family for the channel (e.g. "editorial" or "creative")

ChannelId.description: Specifies the identification number for the channel

NotificationCount.description: Specifies the current count of notifications pending in the channel

download_notes.description: Associate a note with the download of an image.

project_code.description: Specifies the associated project code saved with the downloaded of an image.

asset_id.description: Specifies the unique identifier for the asset.

asset_type.description: Indicates the asset type classification. Possible values are: image, video.

date_purchased.description: Specifies the date the asset was downloaded, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31T00:00:00-00:00).

license_model.description: Specifies the licensing model for the asset. Possible values are: royaltyfree, rightsmanaged, rightsready.

thumb_uri.description: GET this URI to download the thumbnail.

result_count.description: Count of previously purchased assets returned.

date_purchased.description: Specifies the date the image was downloaded, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31T00:00:00-00:00).

image_id.description: Specifies the unique identifier for the image.

license_model.description: Specifies the licensing model for the image. Possible values are: royaltyfree, rightsmanaged.

thumb_uri.description: GET this URI to download the thumbnail.

result_count.description: Count of previously purchased images returned.

products.description: List of available Getty Images products.

RegisterAssetsRequest.description: Specify request containing the list of asset ids you want to register.

asset_ids.description: Specifies the list of asset ids you want to register.

how_can_i_use_it.description: Specifies how the asset can be used.

asset_type.description: Indicates the asset type. Possible values are: image, video.

date_added.description: Specifies the date that the asset was added to the board.

display_sizes.description: Lists the display sizes available for the asset.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the asset.

asset_usage.description: Specifies the id, usage quantity, and date of when an asset was used.

asset_id.description: Specifies the Id of the asset that was used.

quantity.description: Specifies the number of times the asset was used.

usage_date.description: Identifies the date the asset was used, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD), time is not needed.

asset_count.description: Specifies the total count of assets associated with the board.

board_relationship.description: Indicates whether the user owns the board or has been invited to it as an editor. Possible values are: owned, invited.

date_created.description: Specifies the date that the board was created.

date_last_updated.description: Specifies the date that the board was last updated.

description.description: Specifies the description of the board.

hero_asset.description: Specifies the asset on a board that is used to represent the overall board.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the board.

name.description: Specifies the name of the board.

can_add_comment.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to add a comment to the comments list.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the board.

asset_count.description: Specifies the total count of assets associated with the board.

assets.description: Lists the assets associated with the board.

comment_count.description: Specifies the total count of comments on the board.

date_created.description: Specifies the date that the board was created.

date_last_updated.description: Specifies the date that the board was last updated.

description.description: Specifies the description of the board.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the board.

links.description: Specifies URIs that can be used to share or invite other collaborators to a board.

name.description: Specifies the name of the board.

permissions.description: Specifies the allowed actions for the collaborator at the board level.

board_count.description: Specifies the total count of boards that the collaborator participates in

boards.description: Lists boards that the collaborator participates in

can_add_assets.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to add assets to the board.

can_delete_board.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to delete the board.

can_invite_to_board.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to invite a user to the board.

can_remove_assets.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to remove assets from the board.

can_update_description.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to update the board description.

can_update_name.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to update the board name.

first_name.description: Specifies the first name of a collaborator.

last_name.description: Specifies the last name of a collaborator.

asset_family.description: Indicates the asset family classification. Possible values are: creative, editorial.

code.description: Specifies the code of the collection.

id.description: Specifies the unique identifier for the collection.

license_model.description: Specifies the licensing model for the asset. Possible values are: royaltyfree, rightsmanaged, rightsready.

name.description: Specifies the name of the collection.

product_types.description: Specifies the license agreements applied to this collection. Possible values are: premiumaccess, easyaccess, editorialsubscription, imagepack, royaltyfreesubscription, creditpack.

collections.description: List of collections that belongs to the client.

created_by.description: Specifies the collaborator who created the comment.

date_created.description: Specifies the date that the comment was created.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier for the comment.

permissions.description: Specifies the allowed actions for the collaborator for a comment.

text.description: Specifies the text of the comment.

id.description: Specifies a unique identifier of the comment.

permissions.description: Specifies the allowed actions for the collaborator at the comment list level.

can_delete_comment.description: Specifies whether the collaborator is allowed to delete the comment.

iso_alpha_2.description: The 2 Character ISO 3166-1 code for the country aka US, GB, CA, MX.

iso_alpha_3.description: The 3 character ISO 3166-1 code for the country aka USA, CAN, GBR, MEX.

name.description: Specifies the name of the country.

allowed_use.description: Specifies how customers are allowed to use the image.

alternative_ids.description: Lists all of the alternative ids for the asset.

asset_family.description: Indicates the asset family classification. Possible values are: creative, editorial.

call_for_image.description: Indicates whether a customer needs to call Getty Images in order to license this image.

caption.description: Gives a brief description of the image.

collection_code.description: Specifies the code of the collection to which the image belongs.

copyright.description: Specifies the copyright of the image.

date_camera_shot.description: Specifies the date the image was shot, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31T00:00:00-00:00).

display_sizes.description: Lists the display sizes available for this image.

graphical_style.description: Specifies the graphical style for the image. Possible values are Photography, Fine Art, and Illustration.

id.description: Specifies the unique identifier for the image.

keywords.description: Lists the keywords that are associated with this image.

largest_downloads.description: Lists the available largest download sizes.

license_model.description: Specifies the licensing model for the image. Possible values are: royaltyfree, rightsmanaged.

max_dimensions.description: Specifies the maximum height and width of any size for this image.

orientation.description: Specifies the orientation of the image. Possible values are: Horizontal, PanoramicHorizontal, PanoramicVertical, Square, Vertical, and null.

prestige.description: Specifies the image is in the curated Prestige collection.

product_types.description: Lists the product types for the image. Possible values are: premiumaccess, easyaccess, editorialsubscription, imagepack, royaltyfreesubscription, creditpack.

quality_rank.description: Assigned to editorial images to rank their relevance to the event they belong to. This number has no relevance for creative images even though it does appear in the metadata. Possible values are: 1 - most relevant, 2 - tells story from a wider perspective, 3 - stock/repeats/less important.

referral_destinations.description: Lists the referral destinations for Getty Images assets.

uri_oembed.description: GET this URI to retrieve the display image, if embeddable.

result_count.description: Specifies the count of matching images returned.

uri.description: GET this URI to retrieve image details regarding the related resource.

count.description: Count of download overages used to date on a Premium Access agreement

limit.description: Maximum count of download overages allowed on a Premium Access agreement

overages_reached.description: Specifies whether the download limit has been reached and download overages are being used on a Premium Access agreement

remaining.description: Count of remaining download overages available on a Premium Access agreement

agreement_name.description: Specifies the customer-defined name of the Premium Access agreement

credits_remaining.description: Specifies the remaining credit pack limit

download_limit.description: Specifies the download limit for product or package.

download_limit_duration.description: Specifies the end date of current download limit.

download_limit_reset_utc_date.description: Specifies the date when download limit will reset, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31T00:00:00-00:00).

download_requirements.description: Specifies the download requirements a company can apply on its users.

expiration_utc_date.description: Specifies the expiration date, in ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31T00:00:00-00:00).

imagepack_resolution.description: Indicates the resolution for the image pack. Possible values are: high, medium, low.

name.description: Specifies the name of Getty Images product.

overage.description: Describes the current state of the download overage provision on a Premium Access agreement

status.description: Specifies if product status is active or inactive.

type.description: List of product types available. Possible values are: premiumaccess, easyaccess, editorialsubscription, imagepack, royaltyfreesubscription, creditpack.

actions.title: AssetChanges_PutAssetChanges
actions.description: Generates asset changes.

Accept-Language.description: Accept-Language parameter optional. Used to restrict the set of natural languages that are preferred as a response to the request.

channel_id.description: Specifies the id of the channel for the asset data. Valid channel ids can be found in the results of the Get Partner Channel query.

batch_size.description: Specifies the number of assets to return. The default is 10; maximum is 500.

Authorization.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

actions.title: AssetChanges_DeleteAssetChanges
actions.description: Confirm asset changes acknowledges receipt of asset changes.

Accept-Language.description: Accept-Language parameter optional. Used to restrict the set of natural languages that are preferred as a response to the request.

change-set-id.description: Specify the change-set-id associated with a transaction resource whose receipt you want to confirm.

Authorization.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

actions.title: AssetChanges_GetPartnerChannel
actions.description: Retrieves the channel data for the partner. This data can be used to populate the channel_id parameter in the Put Asset Changes query.

Accept-Language.description: Accept-Language parameter optional. Used to restrict the set of natural languages that are preferred as a response to the request.

Authorization.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

actions.title: AssetRegistration_Register
actions.description: Register a list of customer assets.

Authorization.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

Accept-Language.description: Accept-Language parameter optional. Used to restrict the set of natural languages that are preferred as a response to the request.

actions.title: Boards_GetAllBoards
actions.description: ***BETA*** Get all boards that the user participates in

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_relationship.description: Search for boards the user owns or has been invited to as an editor.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of boards to return in each page. (default is 30).

sort_order.description: Sort the list of boards by last update date or name. Defaults to date_last_updated_descending.

actions.title: Boards_CreateBoard
actions.description: ***BETA*** Create a new board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

actions.title: Boards_DeleteBoard
actions.description: ***BETA*** Delete a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

actions.title: Boards_GetBoard
actions.description: ***BETA*** Get assets and metadata for a specific board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_id.description: Retrieve details for a specific board.

actions.title: Boards_UpdateBoard
actions.description: ***BETA*** Update a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

actions.title: Boards_RemoveAssets
actions.description: ***BETA*** Remove assets from a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_id.description: Specify the board to remove assets from.

asset_ids.description: List the assets to be removed from the board.

actions.title: Boards_AddAssets
actions.description: ***BETA*** Add assets to a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_id.description: Specify the board to add assets to.

actions.title: Boards_RemoveAsset
actions.description: ***BETA*** Remove an asset from a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

asset_id.description: Specify the asset to remove from the board.

board_id.description: Specify the board to remove an asset from.

actions.title: Boards_AddAsset
actions.description: ***BETA*** Add an asset to a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

asset_id.description: Specify the asset to add to the board. If it is already in the board's asset collection, no action is taken.

board_id.description: Specify the board to add an asset to.

actions.title: Boards_GetComments
actions.description: ***BETA*** Get comments from a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_id.description: Specify the board to retrieve comments from.

actions.title: Boards_AddComment
actions.description: ***BETA*** Add a comment to a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_id.description: Specify the board to add a comment to.

actions.title: Boards_DeleteComment
actions.description: ***BETA*** Delete a comment from a board

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Provide a header to specify the language of result values.

board_id.description: Specify the board containing the comment to delete.

actions.title: Collections_GetCollections
actions.description: Gets collections applicable for the customer.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

actions.title: Countries_GetCountries
actions.description: Gets countries codes and names.

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

actions.title: Downloads_GetDownloads
actions.description: Returns information about a customer's downloaded assets.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

company_downloads.description: If specified, returns the list of previously downloaded images for all users in your company. Your account must be enabled for this functionality. Contact your Getty Images account rep for more information. Default is false.

date_from.description:
If specified, select assets downloaded on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO
                8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.sss). If time is omitted, midnight is assumed. Date/times are UTC.

date_to.description:
If specified, select assets downloaded on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO
                8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.sss). If time is omitted, midnight is assumed. Date/times are UTC.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_type.description: Specifies product type to be included in the previous download results.

actions.title: v3.downloads.images.id.post
actions.description:
The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest
                image available.
                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: Id of image to download.

auto_download.description:
Specifies whether to auto-download the image. If true is specified, a 303 SeeOther status is returned with a
                    Location header set to the location of the image.
                    If false is specified, the download URI will be returned in the response message.

file_type.description: File Type expressed with three character file extension.

height.description:
Specifies the pixel height of the particular image to download.
                    Available heights can be found in the images/{ids} response for the specific image.
                    If left blank, it will return the largest available size.

product_id.description: Identifier of the instance for the selected product offering type.

actions.title: Downloads_PostVideoDownloads
actions.description:
The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest
                video available.
                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: Id of video to download.

auto_download.description:
Specifies whether to auto-download the video. If true is specified, a 303 SeeOther status is returned with a
                    Location header set to the location of the video.
                    If false is specified, the download URI will be returned in the response message.

product_id.description: Identifier of the instance for the selected product offering type.

size.description: Specifies the size to be downloaded.

actions.title: v3.downloads.id.post
actions.description:
The single step download call returns either a redirect or a response message with the URI to download the largest
                image available.
                Returns HTTP status code 303 Redirect to download URI or HTTP status code 200.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: Id of image to download.

auto_download.description:
Specifies whether to auto-download the image. If true is specified, a 303 SeeOther status is returned with a
                    Location header set to the location of the image.
                    If false is specified, the download URI will be returned in the response message.

file_type.description: File Type expressed with three character file extension.

height.description:
Specifies the pixel height of the particular image to download.
                    Available heights can be found in the images/{ids} response for the specific image.
                    If left blank, it will return the largest available size.

product_id.description: Identifier of the instance for the selected product offering type.

actions.title: Events_GetBatch
actions.description: Returns an array of event metadata

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

fields.description: A comma separated list of fields to return in the response.

ids.description: A comma separated list of event ids.

actions.title: Events_Get
actions.description: Returns an array of event metadata

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: An event id.

fields.description: A comma separated list of fields to return in the response.

actions.title: Images_GetBatch
actions.description: Get metadata for multiple images by supplying multiple image ids

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

ids.description: Specifies one or more image ids to return. Use comma delimiter when requesting multiple ids.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

actions.title: Images_Get
actions.description: Get metadata for a single image by supplying one image id

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: An image id. For more than one image please use the /v3/images endpoint.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

actions.title: Images_GetSimilarImages
actions.description: Search for images similar to an image

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: Identifies an existing image

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

actions.title: Products_GetProducts
actions.description: Get Products

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

fields.description: Comma separated list of fields. Allows product download requirements to be returned.

actions.title: Purchases_GetPreviousAssetPurchases
actions.description: Get Previously Purchased Images and Video

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

date_from.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

date_to.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 75, maximum page_size is 100.

actions.title: Purchases_GetPreviousPurchases
actions.description: Get Previously Purchased Images

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

date_from.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or after this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

date_to.description: If specified, retrieves previous purchases on or before this date. Dates should be submitted in ISO 8601 format (i.e., YYYY-MM-DD).

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 75, maximum page_size is 100.

actions.title: Search_GetEvents
actions.description: Search for events

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

date_from.description: Filters to events that start on or after this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

date_to.description: Filters to events that start on or before this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

editorial_segment.description: Filters to events with a matching editorial segment.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Default set is 'id','name','start_date'.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Filters to events related to this phrase

actions.title: Search_GetImagesByPhrase
actions.description: Search for both creative and editorial images

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Filter based on the age of individuals in an image.

artists.description: Search for images by specific artists (free-text, comma-separated list of artists).

collection_codes.description: Filter by collection codes (comma-separated list). Include or exclude based on collections_filter_type.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

color.description: Filter based on predominant color in an image. Use 6 character hexidecimal format (e.g., #002244). Note: when specified, results will not contain editorial images.

embed_content_only.description: Restrict search results to embeddable images. The default is false.

ethnicity.description: Filter search results based on the ethnicity of individuals in an image.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

file_types.description: Return only images having a specific file type.

graphical_styles.description: Filter based on graphical style of the image.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

minimum_size.description: Filter based on minimum size requested.

number_of_people.description: Filter based on the number of people in the image.

orientations.description: Return only images with selected aspect ratios.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Search images using a search phrase.

prestige_content_only.description: Restrict search results to prestige images. The default is false.

product_types.description: Filter images to those having product types from the selected list.

specific_people.description: Return only images associated with specific people (using a comma-delimited list).

actions.title: Search_GetCreativeImagesByPhrase
actions.description: Search for creative images only

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Filter based on the age of individuals in an image.

artists.description: Search for images by specific artists (free-text, comma-separated list of artists).

collection_codes.description: Filter by collection codes (comma-separated list). Include or exclude based on collections_filter_type.

collections_filter_type.description: Use to include or exclude collections from search.

color.description: Filter based on predominant color in an image. Use 6 character hexidecimal format (e.g., #002244).

embed_content_only.description: Restrict search results to embeddable images. The default is false.

ethnicity.description: Filter search results based on the ethnicity of individuals in an image.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

file_types.description: Return only images having a specific file type.

graphical_styles.description: Filter based on graphical style of the image.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

minimum_size.description: Filter based on minimum size requested.

number_of_people.description: Filter based on the number of people in the image.

orientations.description: Return only images with selected aspect ratios.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Search images using a search phrase.

prestige_content_only.description: Restrict search results to prestige images. The default is false.

product_types.description: Filter images to those having product types from the selected list.

actions.title: Search_GetEditorialImagesByPhrase
actions.description: Search for editorial images only

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Filter based on the age of individuals in an image.

artists.description: Search for images by specific artists (free-text, comma-separated list of artists).

collection_codes.description: Filter by collections (comma-separated list of collection codes). Include or exclude based on collections_filter_type.

collections_filter_type.description: Use to include or exclude collections from search.

date_from.description: Return only images that are created on or after this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

date_to.description: Return only images that are created on or before this date. Use ISO 8601 format (e.g., 1999-12-31).

editorial_segments.description: Return only events with a matching editorial segment.

embed_content_only.description: Restrict search results to embeddable images. The default is false.

ethnicity.description: Filter search results based on the ethnicity of individuals in an image.

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

file_types.description: Return only images having a specific file type.

graphical_styles.description: Filter based on graphical style of the image.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

minimum_quality_rank.description: Filter search results based on minimum quality ranking. Possible values 1, 2, 3 with 1 being best.

minimum_size.description: Filter based on minimum size requested.

number_of_people.description: Filter based on the number of people in the image.

orientations.description: Return only images with selected aspect ratios.

page.description: Request results starting at a page number (default is 1).

page_size.description: Request number of images to return in each page.

phrase.description: Search images using a search phrase.

product_types.description: Filter images to those having product types from the selected list.

specific_people.description: Return only images associated with specific people (using a comma-delimited list).

actions.title: Search_GetVideosByPhrase
actions.description: Search for both creative and editorial videos

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Provides filtering according to the age of individuals in a video.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

format_available.description: Filters according to the digital video format available on a film asset.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_types.description: Provides filtering by a list of product types.

specific_people.description: Provides filtering by specific peoples' names.

actions.title: Search_GetCreativeVideosByPhrase
actions.description: Search for creative videos

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Provides filtering according to the age of individuals in a video.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

format_available.description: Filters according to the digital video format available on a film asset.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_types.description: Allows filtering by a list of product types.

actions.title: Search_GetEditorialVideosByPhrase
actions.description: Search for editorial videos

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

age_of_people.description: Provides filtering according to the age of individuals in a video.

collections_filter_type.description: Provides searching based on specified collection(s).

exclude_nudity.description: Excludes images containing nudity. The default is false.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

format_available.description: Filters according to the digital video format available on a film asset.

keyword_ids.description: Return only images tagged with specific keyword(s). Specify using a comma-separated list of keyword Ids. If keyword Ids and phrase are both specified, only those images matching the query phrase which also contain the requested keyword(s) are returned.

page.description: Identifies page to return. Default is 1.

page_size.description: Specifies page size. Default is 30, maximum page_size is 100.

product_types.description: Allows filtering by a list of product types.

specific_people.description: Allows filtering by specific peoples' names.

actions.title: Usage_Put
actions.description: Report usage of assets via a batch format.

Accept-Language.description: Accept-Language parameter optional. Used to restrict the set of natural languages that are preferred as a response to the request.

id.description: Specifies a unique batch transaction id to identify the report.

Authorization.description: Authorization token required. Used for applying content access restrictions. Use one of the OAuth2 grants to auto-populate this value.

actions.title: Videos_GetBatch
actions.description: Get metadata for multiple videos by supplying multiple video ids

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

ids.description: Specifies one or more video ids to return. Use comma delimiter when requesting multiple ids.

fields.description: Specifies fields to return. Defaults to 'summary_set'.

actions.title: Videos_Get
actions.description: Get metadata for a single video by supplying one video id

Accept-Language.description: Specifies the language of result values.

Authorization.description: Provide access token in the format of 'Bearer {token}'.

id.description: A video id. For more than one video please use the /v3/video endpoint.

fields.description: comma delimited list of fields to retrive for the video
